title: Dynamic queue/"Ranked Flex"
body:
Why the hell are we doing Provisionals for Ranked flex?

That is what we have been forced into all year, the only thing that needs provisionals, is ranked Solo/Duo, which by the looks of things ISN'T getting the provisionals.

replies.body: preseason only. not liked it matters... it all gets reset eventually
It matters because somehow i am seeing Plat-Bronze all in the same game.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=8obmvnAa,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-11-09T04:04:26.940+0000)
>
> It matters because somehow i am seeing Plat-Bronze all in the same game.

Exactly! And as a result games aren't balanced at all. Which leads to another question: How do they evaluate how good you did at the placements  if you had to play vs platinos while you are bronze?
lmao I won 8 of my 10 provisionals and got placed in bronze.... Im gold in normal ranked.... this is bs...

1+
This is bonkers. I've been getting afk, rage quitters and trolls for all 10 of my ranked flex, got into B5. But my solo rank is still S3. Where are the other ranked queues?
